title: Nightbringer Path of Chaos ... no skin at end? just random items?
body: Is there really no skin for this 1300 quest? I ACCIDENTALLY bought it, and I'm not even getting a skin for 1300//I tried refunding it but I can't. It is so disappointing. I am really ad I wasted 13 bucks on accident. I was just trying to look at the thing to figure out what it is...and at the end of it I don't think there is a skin?

replies.body: Since this is such a new event and some of the items can be a little confusing, go ahead and reach out to our billing team through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look over your account and see how we can help!
